body: Thank very much, Stephen! I found that unexploded Brep object will not be properly processed by the code: only the first surface within the Brep object will be converted to a mesh. Can you kindly advise the rhinoscript to explode a Brep surface? Thank you! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/viirmOBcoEG8nTbwb3U0FWrxcmPuFskHwRF487dG-bwnKRbV1-fjVMxdoHCDwDMb1t1WA-YjSC8AoudpgUyj6xYAwoJHr8ky/Capture.PNG)
